title: BASIC NCD SCREENING
desc: This includes basic tests and examinations that will provide a first-level assessment looking at the risk factors of the individual.

title: FULL NCD SCREENING
desc: This includes the tests as part of the Basic NCD Screening and additional tests that will provide a detailed first-level assessment looking at the NCD risk factors of the individual.

title: FULL NCD+ SCREENING
desc: This includes key cancer test markers that would detect the risk / presence of specific cancers that could be treated if detected early.

title: FULL NCD+CD SCREENING
desc: This includes the tests for key communicable (infectious) diseases that could affect you and the community that you live in.

title: BASIC HEALTH SCREENING
desc: This includes a full set of tests that would provide a full profile of the key health panels as part of a full screening report that can be used as part follow-up consultation

title: COMPLETE SCREENING HEALTH KIT
desc: This includes all the tests in the Basic Health Screening as well as additional imaging tests that would provide a comprehensive medical provided by GP Doctor

title: COMPREHENSIVE HEALTH SCREENING
desc: This includes all the tests in the Complete Health Screening as well as additional cancer screening tests. (Recommeded above for those 40 years old)
